about_the_game:
The World of Circadian

Circadian is an engaging retro-style role playing video game. Strange things start to happen in a small suburban town when the circadian sleep cycles of all creatures goes haywire. A group of misfits must work together to solve the mysteries of their community before the entire thing unravels. Unlock the secrets of the Unrest Rhythm, saving those you love, and possibly the entire world.

Welcome to Mount Olive!

Welcome to the small suburban village of Mount Olive! Here you'll find wildlife, trees, mountains and mysteries! Although known for its quiet atmosphere, this hamlet gets more peculiar every day. When a shady corporation suddenly moves into town, a young man finds himself on the short end of their laundry list. Take control of a group of young adults as they strive to protect themselves and their beloved suburb.

What to expect

  • Turn Based Combat
  • Quirky Characters
  • Unforgettable Enemies
  • Computer Hacking
  • Arcade Mini Games
  • Hamburgers

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 and Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Sierra 10.12.6+
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Metal-capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Additional Notes: Apple officially supported drivers

name: Circadian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • Additional Notes: Hardware vendor officially supported drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Circadian is an engaging retro-style RPG. Defend yourself in turn-based combat with strange and bewildering enemies. Solve puzzles, sniffing out all the strange clues about the small suburban village of Mount Olive. Talk with all the quirky villagers, and seek out some help from your friends!
